foods.name: Pasta
foods.body: Pasta is a type of food made from a mixture of flour, eggs, and water that is formed into different shapes and then boiled. Spaghetti, macaroni, and noodles are types of pasta.

foods.name: Frid rice
foods.body: Fried rice is a dish of cooked rice that has been stir-fried in a wok or a frying pan and is usually mixed with other ingredients such as eggs, vegetables, seafood, or meat. It is often eaten by itself or as an accompaniment to another dish.

foods.name: Sandwitch
foods.body: A sandwich is a food typically consisting of vegetables, sliced cheese or meat, placed on or between slices of bread, or more generally any dish wherein bread serves as a container or wrapper for another food type.

foods.name: Pizza
foods.body: Pizza is a dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flat base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients (such as anchovies, mushrooms, onions, olives, pineapple, meat, etc.), which is then baked at a high temperature.

foods.name: burger
foods.body: burgers are often served with cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, bacon, or chilis, condiments such as ketchup, mustard, mayonnaise, relish.

foods.name: French fries
foods.body: French frice/chips are prepared by cutting the potato into even strips, then drying and frying it. Most french fries are produced from frozen Russet potatoes.

foods.name: Fruit juice
foods.body: Fruit juice is 100% pure juice made from the flesh of fresh fruit or from whole fruit, depending on the type used.

foods.name: Veggie juice
foods.body: Veggie juice is 100% pure juice made from the flesh of fresh vegitables or from whole vegitable, depending on the type used.

foods.name: Tea
foods.body: Tea is an aromatic beverage commonly prepared by pouring hot or boiling water over cured leaves of the Camellia sinensis

foods.name: Cake
foods.body: Cake is a form of sweet food made from flour, sugar, and other ingredients, that is usually baked.
